OnfidoResults.Title: Verify your identity
OnfidoResults.PleaseWait: Please wait a few moments while we validate your information..
OnfidoResults.CouldNotBeVerified:
Your identity could not be verified.
Please contact us at support@klearing.com.
We will schedule an identity verification through a video call.

alert.another_doc: Documents from that country are not currently supported — <fallback>try another document type</fallback>

poa_alert.country_not_found: Sorry about that. We are working on supporting more countries.

cross_device_error_desktop.subtitle: The link only works on mobile devices
cross_device_error_desktop.title: Something’s gone wrong

cross_device_error_restart.subtitle: You’ll need to restart your verification on your computer
cross_device_error_restart.title: Something’s gone wrong

cross_device_intro.list_accessibility: Steps required to continue verification on your mobile
cross_device_intro.list_item_finish: Check back here to finish the submission
cross_device_intro.list_item_open_link: Open the link and complete the tasks
cross_device_intro.list_item_send_phone: Send a secure link to your phone
cross_device_intro.subtitle: Here’s how to do it:
cross_device_intro.title: Verify your identity

cross_device_return.body: Your computer may take a few seconds to update
cross_device_return.subtitle: You can now return to your computer to continue
cross_device_return.title: Uploads successful

cross_device_session_linked.list_item_sent_by_you: This link was sent by you — seek advice if you think this could be a scam
cross_device_session_linked.subtitle: Continue with the verification
cross_device_session_linked.title: Mobile session linked to your computer

detail.folded_doc_front: Lay your document flat, include all inner pages (must contain your photo)

prompt.title_id: What type of identity card do you have?
prompt.title_license: What type of license do you have?

alert.crop_detail: Make sure full document is visible
alert.no_doc_detail: Make sure it’s fully in the frame

doc_confirmation.body: Make sure you have uploaded the entire document page, and details are clear to read with no blur or glare
doc_confirmation.body_bank_statement: Make sure you have uploaded the entire document page, and details are clear to read with no blur or glare

doc_confirmation.body_id: Make sure your details are clear and unobstructed

doc_confirmation.body_license: Make sure your details are clear and unobstructed
doc_confirmation.body_passport: Make sure your details are clear and unobstructed
doc_confirmation.body_permit: Make sure your details are clear and unobstructed

doc_multi_frame_capture.instructions_title_back: Position the back of your document in the frame
doc_multi_frame_capture.instructions_title_front: Position the front of your document in the frame

doc_select.button_benefits_letter_detail: Government authorised household benefits eg. Jobseeker allowance, Housing benefit, Tax credits
doc_select.button_bill_detail: Gas, electricity, water, landline, or broadband
doc_select.button_government_letter_detail: Any government issued letter eg. Benefits entitlement, Voting letters, Tax letters, etc
doc_select.list_accessibility: Documents you can use to verify your identity
doc_select.subtitle: It must be an official photo ID
doc_select.subtitle_country: Select issuing country to see which documents we accept
doc_select.subtitle_poa: These are the documents most likely to show your current home address
doc_select.title: Verify your identity

doc_submit.button_link_upload: or upload photo – no scans or photocopies
doc_submit.subtitle: Take a photo with your phone

error_unsupported_browser.subtitle_android: Restart the process on the latest version of Google Chrome
error_unsupported_browser.subtitle_ios: Restart the process on the latest version of Safari

geoblocked_error.instruction: We’re sorry, seems like we can’t proceed further as your current location is not supported

interrupted_flow_error.instruction: Restart process on a different device

lazy_loading.message: An error occurred while loading the component

multiple_faces.instruction: Only your face can be in the selfie

no_face.instruction: Make sure your face is visible

sms_failed.instruction: Copy the link to your phone

sms_overuse.instruction: Copy the link to your phone

unsupported_file.instruction: Try using a JPG or PNG file

get_link.alert_wrong_number: Check that your number is correct
get_link.info_qr_how: How to scan a QR code
get_link.info_qr_how_list_item_camera: Point your phone’s camera at the QR code
get_link.info_qr_how_list_item_download: If it doesn’t work, download a QR code scanner from Google Play or the App Store
get_link.subtitle_qr: Scan the QR code with your phone
get_link.subtitle_sms: Send this one-time link to your phone
get_link.subtitle_url: Send this one-time link to your phone
get_link.title: Verify your identity
get_link.url_field_label: Copy the link to your mobile browser

livenessV2.intro_note_no1: First, position your face in the frame
livenessV2.intro_note_no2: Then, turn your head slowly to both sides
livenessV2.intro_ready_button: Please be mindful that we’ll record your face and your background
livenessV2.intro_subtitle: This is to verify that you’re a real person
livenessV2.intro_warning: Please be mindful that we’ll record your face and your background
livenessV2.success_title: That’s all we need to start verifying your identity

outro.body: That’s all we need to start verifying your identity
outro.body_government_letter: Provide the whole document page for best results
outro.title: Thank you

permission.body_both: We can’t verify you without using both your camera and microphone
permission.body_cam: We can’t verify you without your camera
permission.subtitle_both: When prompted, you must enable access for both to continue
permission.subtitle_cam: When prompted, you must enable camera access to continue

permission_recovery.list_header_both: Follow these steps to recover access for both:
permission_recovery.list_header_cam: Follow these steps to recover camera access:
permission_recovery.list_item_action_cam: Refresh this page to restart the identity verification process
permission_recovery.list_item_how_to_both: Grant access to your camera and microphone from your browser settings
permission_recovery.list_item_how_to_cam: Grant access to your camera from your browser settings
permission_recovery.subtitle_both: Recover camera and microphone access to take a video and complete the verification process
permission_recovery.subtitle_cam: Recover camera access to continue your verification
permission_recovery.subtitle_cam_old: Recover camera access to continue face verification

photo_upload.body_bill: Provide the whole document page for best results

retry_feedback_id_generic.subtitle: Please try again with a valid photo ID and make sure your information is clearly visible

retry_feedback_id_unaccepted.subtitle: Please try again with a valid photo ID and make sure your information is clearly visible
retry_feedback_id_unaccepted.title: Unaccepted document

retry_feedback_selfie_generic.subtitle: Please try again, and make sure your face is visible and well lit

camera_inactive.detail: Check that it is connected and functional. You can also <fallback>continue verification on your phone</fallback>
camera_inactive.detail_no_fallback: Make sure your device has a working camera
camera_inactive.title: Camera not working?

camera_not_working.detail: It may be disconnected. <fallback>Try using your phone instead</fallback>.
camera_not_working.detail_no_fallback: Make sure your device’s camera works
camera_not_working.title: Camera not working

timeout.detail: Remember to press the button when you’re done. <fallback>Redo video actions</fallback>
timeout.title: Looks like you took too long

selfie_capture.body: Keep your face within the oval
selfie_capture.title: Keep your face within the oval

selfie_confirmation.subtitle: Make sure your entire face is visible
selfie_confirmation.title: Check your selfie

selfie_intro.list_accessibility: Tips to take a good selfie
selfie_intro.list_item_face_forward: Face forward and make sure your eyes are clearly visible
selfie_intro.subtitle: We’ll compare this with your document

sms_sent.info_link_expire: Your link will expire in one hour
sms_sent.info_link_window: Keep this window open while using your mobile

switch_phone.title: Connected to your mobile

upload_guide.image_detail_blur_label: All details must be clear — nothing blurry
upload_guide.image_detail_cutoff_label: Show all details — including the bottom 2 lines
upload_guide.image_detail_glare_label: Move away from direct light — no glare
upload_guide.image_detail_good_label: The photo should clearly show your document
upload_guide.subtitle: Scans and photocopies are not accepted
upload_guide.title: Upload passport photo page

prompt.no_consent_detail: If you do not accept Onfido’s privacy statements and terms of service, we will not be able to verify your identity and you will exit this step.

user_consent_load_fail.detail: Check that your connection is stable, then try again
user_consent_load_fail.title: Content failed to load

welcome.doc_video_subtitle: It should take a few minutes
welcome.subtitle: It should take a few minutes

reject.description: We haven't been able to verify your identity
